jmplib.util.intercessor

Class IntercessorValidators

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmplib.util.intercessor.IntercessorValidators

  • public class IntercessorValidators
extends java.lang.Object
    This class concentrates all the method to validate the parameters passed to many of the JMPLib primitives
    Author:
    Jose Manuel Redondo Lopez
